JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Information   Mean Stack Developer (mongodb,  Experess JS,  Angular JS and Noad JS) IT/ Software       Bangalore,  Pune,  Mumbai       2 - 5 yrs    Keyskills :  Javascript,  Mean Stack,  Angularjs,  Node.Js,  Html5,  MongoDB,  Web Development,  Software Development ,  GIT,  Docker,  Full Stack Developer,  angular,  UI Developer,  Web UI Developer,  css3   Job Description :   Strong knowledge of MEAN stack (MongoDB,  ExpressJS,  AngularJS,  Node.js,  HTML5,  CSS3,  SASS)+ years in a development role,  preferably on a SaaS Product (CMS/ Commerce/ Retail development would be preferred). Experience in a role on large,  single-page application website development project(s) (MongoDB,  Express.js Angular.js,  Node.js,  HTML5,  CSS3). Experience working in cloud container environments such as Docker or Kubernetes.  2+ years with the Agile Scrum software development methodology. Expert in Git. A demonstrated track record of successfully delivering complex projects with demanding deadlines. Experience in AWS and familiarity with container technology (Docker,  Kubernetes). Ability to translate technical information to the non-technical,  and likewise,  to translate non-technical speak into code. Attention to details,  and ability to stay on task. Ability to effectively deal with ambiguity,  uncertainty,  and incomplete information when evaluating alternatives and making recommendations.
